name: Anti's Building Guide
landing_text: While I'm no expert builder, I thought since a main focus of my modpack is building and creativity I should show you some things like my favorite building blocks, decor and even tips for building!$(br2)All content of my building guide will be uploaded to my OneNote plus pictures. $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://1drv.ms/u/s!Atp2GkCazUCzb49PlX2XkJHiyAA)Here's the link
